title: Introducing Programmatic AWS Landing Zone as Terraform Module
description: AWS Landing Zone is a solution that helps customers more quickly set up a secure, multi-account AWS environment based on AWS best practices.

title: AWS Lambda to Redshift Connection using IAM authentication and NAT gateway
description: Python Edition. This article walks through the steps taken and lessons learned, in order to connect AWS Lambda to Amazon Redshift running in Amazon VPC...

title: You get what you get and you don’t get upset
description: Or how we as adults forget about basic principles we teach kids, but for some reason tend to think that we’ve grown up and it doesn’t apply to us anymore
